rows.label: tev022702_MSG0001
rows.name:
Are you the survivor who was found asleep in that
Lifepod?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022702_MSG0002
rows.name:
I heard you faced a lot of indigens out there.
It's like you rolled out of bed and onto a battlefield![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022702_MSG0003
rows.name:
Look, I'm no specialist, but if I were you,
I'd worry that I pushed my body too far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022702_MSG0004
rows.name:
You should head over to the administrative district
for a medical checkup, or at the very least some rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022702_MSG0005
rows.name:
I don't know what you intend to do now that you're
here, but it can wait until you've taken care of yourself.[ST:wait ]
